name: Raw Fury #1
description: Raw Fury #1 : Download Media Kit Raw Fury #1 (ISSN 2327-6002, published by IS Press, Denver in conjunction with Flatlands Studio, Chicago.) is a hand-made 7.5" square, perfect-bound, 60 page, screen-printed, letterpressed, laser printed and photocopied 'zine on mixed paper stock with rounded corners, a gate-fold, and a signed Brooks Golden poster with 13 contributors in a numbered edition of 113 released on May Day 2013. Raw Fury #1 is a luxury 'zine – a ridiculously fancy and publication with professional editorial standards that maintains a diy 'zine ethic. The content is a mix of interviews and images on graphic and street art on the theme of "your neck of the woods." Denver subjects and contributors are Mario Zoots, Heather Link, Tom Horne of Blackbook Gallery, agent m[i]le[s] of Institute of Sociometry, and Esther of Ladies Fancywork Society. Chicago subjects and contributors are Flatlands Studio, Eric Von Haynes, David Cuesta, Oscar Arriola, Narciso Carlos, Dred 88, and Tommy B of Stay Rad Skates. Raw Fury #1 is also available at : Lowbrow in Denver, : Atomic Books in Baltimore, and soon at: Quimby's in Chicago! Free shipping! ----- Peter Miles Bergman and Eric Von Haynes editors. Contributors listed above 2013 | Edition of 113 Letterpressed covers and edition pages, screenprinted inside covers and poster inserts, laserprinted and photocopied on mixed stock and hand perfect bound. 7.5x7.5" 60 pages

artists.name: Peter Miles Bergman & Eric Von Haynes

name: PaCT - flip book
description: We're on vacation until 6/15 - all orders will be shipped by 6/20. Thanks for your patience PaCT is a photo animation flip book that documents an 82 day 1,700 miles walk south to north on the california section of The Pacific Crest Trail. Check out the animation! on sociometry.com Out of the edition of 111 IS PRESS only has 11 left. Free shipping! ----- Peter Miles Bergman 2007 | Edition of 111 CMYK offset and hand perfect bound. 2.5x7" 82 pages

name: DESIGN savior of ... the Univers
description: We're on vacation until 6/15 - all orders will be shipped by 6/20. Thanks for your patience Letterpress poster in silver ink on black textured cover-stock. The type hand set in wood Futura and metal... Univers (duh!) and metal stars. The prints are lightly embossed and emphasize the natural irregularities of wood type printing. ----- Peter Miles Bergman with assistance from Toby Kelleher and Michelle Murphey 2013 | not editioned ~ approximately 60 PMS 877 Silver on black cover stock 11x14.5"
